issue.title: www.bing.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://www.bing.com/search?pglt=417&q=hwinfo&cvid=1411985bdf1147319669eb7e616cc819&gs_lcrp=EgRlZGdlKgYIBhAAGEAyBggAEEUYOTIGCAEQLhhAMgYIAhAAGEAyBggDEAAYQDIGCAQQABhAMgYIBRAAGEAyBggGEAAYQDIGCAcQABhAMgYICBAAGEDSAQg0NTA4ajBqMagCALACAA&FORM=ANNTA1&PC=NMTS&mkt=zh-CN](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.bing.com%2Fsearch%3Fpglt%3D417%26q%3Dhwinfo%26cvid%3D1411985bdf1147319669eb7e616cc819%26gs_lcrp%3DEgRlZGdlKgYIBhAAGEAyBggAEEUYOTIGCAEQLhhAMgYIAhAAGEAyBggDEAAYQDIGCAQQABhAMgYIBRAAGEAyBggGEAAYQDIGCAcQABhAMgYICBAAGEDSAQg0NTA4ajBqMagCALACAA%26FORM%3DANNTA1%26PC%3DNMTS%26mkt%3Dzh-CN) ### Comment > When I use Bing China(bing.com,ip:13.107.21.200) to search "hwinfo" , AdGuard can not reject Ads > > Like this: > { > 百度在线网络技术（北京）有限公司 > https://wenku.baidu.com > 推荐百度文库下载 - AI自定义修改! > 百度文库下载,全行业覆盖. 模板报告,教育考试,法律民生,生活娱乐 > } > > And I try to select Ad by myself , but it seems like Bing China use some a empty Flash element to defend AdGuard to read the website Username: `@Qtgcy08` ### Screenshots

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://www.bing.com/search?pglt=417&q=hwinfo&cvid=1411985bdf1147319669eb7e616cc819&gs_lcrp=EgRlZGdlKgYIBhAAGEAyBggAEEUYOTIGCAEQLhhAMgYIAhAAGEAyBggDEAAYQDIGCAQQABhAMgYIBRAAGEAyBggGEAAYQDIGCAcQABhAMgYICBAAGEDSAQg0NTA4ajBqMagCALACAA&FORM=ANNTA1&PC=NMTS&mkt=zh-CN](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.bing.com%2Fsearch%3Fpglt%3D417%26q%3Dhwinfo%26cvid%3D1411985bdf1147319669eb7e616cc819%26gs_lcrp%3DEgRlZGdlKgYIBhAAGEAyBggAEEUYOTIGCAEQLhhAMgYIAhAAGEAyBggDEAAYQDIGCAQQABhAMgYIBRAAGEAyBggGEAAYQDIGCAcQABhAMgYICBAAGEDSAQg0NTA4ajBqMagCALACAA%26FORM%3DANNTA1%26PC%3DNMTS%26mkt%3Dzh-CN) ### Comment > When I use Bing China(bing.com,ip:13.107.21.200) to search "hwinfo" , AdGuard can not reject Ads > > Like this: > { > 百度在线网络技术（北京）有限公司 > https://wenku.baidu.com > 推荐百度文库下载 - AI自定义修改! > 百度文库下载,全行业覆盖. 模板报告,教育考试,法律民生,生活娱乐 > } > > And I try to select Ad by myself , but it seems like Bing China use some a empty Flash element to defend AdGuard to read the website Username: `@Qtgcy08` ### Screenshots

issue.title: https://12punto.com.tr
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

uBlockOrigin  with Adguard cookie filter

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc.

Microsoft Edge
